name: cope-agent
description: AI executive assistant with dynamic context composition using the COPE framework (Clarify, Organise, Prioritise, Execute)
long_description:
COPE Agent is a personal AI executive assistant built on a hierarchical agent architecture. It stays lean by using capability discovery instead of loading all MCP tools at startup. The orchestrator queries available capabilities and spawns specialized agents for specific domains (email, calendar, slack, notion, etc.) only when needed.

Key features:
- Dynamic capability discovery against a lightweight manifest (~800 tokens)
- Specialist agents with domain-specific MCP server connections
- Parallel multi-domain workflows (daily briefing, weekly reviews)
- Support for 10+ specialist agents: email, calendar, slack, notion (personal/work), lifelog, school, miro, finance
- COPE thinking phases: Clarify, Organise, Prioritise, Execute

tools.name: discover_capability
tools.description: Query available capabilities to find the right specialist for a task. Use this to identify which domain handles a request, find the correct specialist agent, and check available workflows.

tools.name: spawn_specialist
tools.description: Launch a specialist subagent to handle a domain-specific task. Specialists include: email-agent, calendar-agent, slack-agent, notion-personal-agent, notion-work-agent, lifelog-agent, school-agent, miro-agent, finance-agent, cope-workflow-agent.

tools.name: spawn_parallel
tools.description: Launch multiple specialists in parallel for multi-domain operations like daily briefings or weekly reviews.
